Class ObjectSigning

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.fnal.ppd.security.ObjectSigning

  • public class ObjectSigning
extends java.lang.Object

    A class to sign any seiralizable object

    Author:
    Elliott McCrory, Fermilab AD/Instrumentation

      • generateNewKeys

                            java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        filenamePublic - -- The name of the public keystore file
        filenamePrivate - -- The name of the private keystore file
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - -- A problem with the encryption service
        java.io.IOException - -- A problem writing the public or private keystores.

                                                  java.io.IOException

        Returns:
        -- The signed object
        Throws:
        java.security.SignatureException - -- An invalid signature
        java.io.IOException - -- A problem reading the keystore
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - -- A problem with the encryption service * @throws InvalidKeySpecException
